query: SELECT e.id, e.name, e.email, e.cargo, e.active, e.userId, u.email as userEmail, u.role as userRole FROM employees e LEFT JOIN users u ON e.userId = u.id WHERE e.email LIKE '%alexsandra%' OR e.name LIKE '%Alexsandra%' OR e.name LIKE '%Fernando Pinto%' OR e.email LIKE '%fernando%' LIMIT 20
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2zjpxFGuGsCP7jR.root --database Vd5BJ8toX8cUC4zST6itFN --execute SELECT e.id, e.name, e.email, e.cargo, e.active, e.userId, u.email as userEmail, u.role as userRole FROM employees e LEFT JOIN users u ON e.userId = u.id WHERE e.email LIKE '%alexsandra%' OR e.name LIKE '%Alexsandra%' OR e.name LIKE '%Fernando Pinto%' OR e.email LIKE '%fernando%' LIMIT 20
